entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
